mapper.sql: ORDER_NO, ORDER_DATE, PLAN_ITEM_NO, ITEM_NO, DISP_DATE, REACH_TIME, REACH_TIME_TYPE, MATNR, UNIT, QTY, PRICE, AMT, REMAIN_AMT, STATUS, CREATE_AT, CREATE_BY, CREATE_BY_TXT, LAST_MODIFIED, LAST_MODIFIED_BY, LAST_MODIFIED_BY_TXT,GIFT_QTY,PROMOTION_FLAG,PRICE_DELIVER,PRICE_HOME, PRICE_NET_VALUE
AND (o.PREORDER_SOURCE = '10' OR o.PREORDER_SOURCE = '20' OR o.PREORDER_SOURCE = '30' OR o.PREORDER_SOURCE = '50' OR o.PREORDER_SOURCE = '60') AND o.ONLINE_SOURCE_TYPE is null
mapper.select: select d.ORDER_NO, d.ORDER_DATE, d.PLAN_ITEM_NO, d.ITEM_NO, d.DISP_DATE,(CASE dayofweek(d.DISP_DATE) WHEN 1 THEN '星期日' WHEN 2 THEN '星期一' WHEN 3 THEN '星期二' WHEN 4 THEN '星期三' WHEN 5 THEN '星期四' WHEN 6 THEN '星期五' WHEN 7 THEN '星期六' END ) WEEKLY, d.REACH_TIME, d.REACH_TIME_TYPE, d.MATNR, UNIT, d.QTY, d.PRICE, d.AMT, d.REMAIN_AMT, d.STATUS, d.CREATE_AT, d.CREATE_BY, d.CREATE_BY_TXT, d.LAST_MODIFIED, d.LAST_MODIFIED_BY, d.LAST_MODIFIED_BY_TXT, ex.SHORT_TXT MATNR_TXT,ex.SHORT_TXT from t_mst_order_daliy_plan_item d , t_md_mara p ,t_preorder o,t_md_mara_ex ex where d.MATNR = p.MATNR and o.ORDER_NO = d.ORDER_NO and o.SALES_ORG = p.SALES_ORG and ex.MATNR=d.MATNR and o.SALES_ORG =ex.SALES_ORG and d.ORDER_NO = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by d.DISP_DATE,d.REMAIN_AMT desc

SELECT SUM(i.qty) QTY,i.MATNR,ex.SHORT_TXT MATNR_TXT FROM t_preorder pd INNER JOIN t_md_branch b on b.BRANCH_NO= pd.BRANCH_NO INNER JOIN t_mst_order_daliy_plan_item i on pd.ORDER_NO=i.ORDER_NO INNER JOIN t_md_mara_ex ex on ex.MATNR=i.MATNR and ex.SALES_ORG=b.SALES_ORG WHERE pd.SIGN='10' and i.status='10' and pd.BRANCH_NO=#{branchNo} and pd.emp_no=#{loginName} and i.DISP_DATE=#{date} GROUP BY i.MATNR,ex.SHORT_TXT ORDER BY QTY

select
from t_mst_order_daliy_plan_item where 1 = 1 and ITEM_NO = #{itemNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select i.ORDER_NO, i.ORDER_DATE, i.PLAN_ITEM_NO, i.ITEM_NO, i.DISP_DATE, i.REACH_TIME, i.REACH_TIME_TYPE, i.MATNR, ex.SHORT_TXT MATNR_TXT,i.UNIT, i.QTY, i.PRICE, i.AMT, i.REMAIN_AMT, i.STATUS, i.CREATE_AT, i.CREATE_BY, i.CREATE_BY_TXT, i.LAST_MODIFIED, i.LAST_MODIFIED_BY, i.LAST_MODIFIED_BY_TXT,i.GIFT_QTY,i.PROMOTION_FLAG from t_mst_order_daliy_plan_item i left JOIN t_preorder o on i.ORDER_NO = o.ORDER_NO LEFT JOIN t_md_mara_ex ex on i.MATNR = ex.MATNR where 1 = 1 and o.SALES_ORG = ex.SALES_ORG and i.ORDER_NO =#{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by i.DISP_DATE desc , i.REMAIN_AMT asc

select
from t_mst_order_daliy_plan_item where ORDER_NO = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and (STATUS = '10'
or STATUS = '20'
or STATUS = '30'
)
and (STATUS = '20'
or STATUS = '10'
or STATUS = '30'
)
and (STATUS = '30'
or STATUS = '20'
or STATUS = '10'
)
order by DISP_DATE asc

select
from t_mst_order_daliy_plan_item where 1 = 1 and ORDER_NO = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by DISP_DATE asc , REMAIN_AMT desc
mapper.insert: insert into t_mst_order_daliy_plan_item (ORDER_NO, ORDER_DATE, PLAN_ITEM_NO, ITEM_NO, DISP_DATE, REACH_TIME, REACH_TIME_TYPE, MATNR, UNIT, QTY, PRICE, AMT, REMAIN_AMT, STATUS, CREATE_AT, CREATE_BY, CREATE_BY_TXT, LAST_MODIFIED, LAST_MODIFIED_BY, LAST_MODIFIED_BY_TXT) values (#{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{planItemNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dispDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{reachTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reachTimeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{matnr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{amt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{remainAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createByTxt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastModifiedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastModifiedByTxt,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into t_mst_order_daliy_plan_item
ORDER_NO,
ORDER_DATE,
PLAN_ITEM_NO,
ITEM_NO,
DISP_DATE,
REACH_TIME,
REACH_TIME_TYPE,
MATNR,
UNIT,
QTY,
PRICE,
AMT,
REMAIN_AMT,
STATUS,
CREATE_AT,
CREATE_BY,
CREATE_BY_TXT,
LAST_MODIFIED,
LAST_MODIFIED_BY,
LAST_MODIFIED_BY_TXT,
GIFT_QTY,
PROMOTION_FLAG,
BALANCE_AMT,
PRICE_DELIVER,
PRICE_HOME,
PRICE_NET_VALUE
#{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{orderDate,jdbcType=DATE},
#{planItemNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{itemNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dispDate,jdbcType=DATE},
#{reachTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{reachTimeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{matnr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{qty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{amt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{remainAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createByTxt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{lastModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{lastModifiedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{lastModifiedByTxt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{giftQty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{promotionFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{balanceAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{priceDeliver,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{priceHome,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{priceNetValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.update:
update t_mst_order_daliy_plan_item
DISP_DATE = #{dispDate,jdbcType=DATE},
REACH_TIME = #{reachTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REACH_TIME_TYPE = #{reachTimeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MATNR = #{matnr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UNIT = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QTY = #{qty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PRICE = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
AMT = #{amt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REMAIN_AMT = #{remainAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_AT = #{createAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_BY_TXT = #{createByTxt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAST_MODIFIED = #{lastModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LAST_MODIFIED_BY = #{lastModifiedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAST_MODIFIED_BY_TXT = #{lastModifiedByTxt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PLAN_ITEM_NO = #{planItemNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where 1=1
and ORDER_NO = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and DISP_DATE = #{dispDate,jdbcType=DATE}
and ITEM_NO = #{itemNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_mst_order_daliy_plan_item
DISP_DATE = #{dispDate,jdbcType=DATE},
REACH_TIME_TYPE = #{reachTimeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MATNR = #{matnr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UNIT = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QTY = #{qty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PRICE = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
AMT = #{amt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REMAIN_AMT = #{remainAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PLAN_ITEM_NO = #{planItemNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_AT = #{createAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_BY_TXT = #{createByTxt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAST_MODIFIED = #{lastModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LAST_MODIFIED_BY = #{lastModifiedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAST_MODIFIED_BY_TXT = #{lastModifiedByTxt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ORDER_NO = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ITEM_NO = #{itemNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and PLAN_ITEM_NO = #{planItemNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select i.DISP_DATE, i.MATNR,m.MATNR_TXT MATNR_TXT,SUM(i.QTY) QTY,m.BASE_UNIT UNIT from t_mst_order_daliy_plan_item i LEFT JOIN t_md_mara m on i.MATNR = m.MATNR LEFT JOIN t_preorder o on i.ORDER_NO = o.ORDER_NO LEFT JOIN t_md_mara_ex e on i.MATNR = e.MATNR where 1=1 and o.PREORDER_STAT !='30' and o.PREORDER_STAT !='40' and i.`STATUS` !='30' and e.SALES_ORG = #{salesOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and i.QTY > 0 and ((e.PRE_DAYS= 2 and i.DISP_DATE = #{secondDay,jdbcType=DATE} ) or (e.PRE_DAYS= 1 and i.DISP_DATE = #{firstDay,jdbcType=DATE})) and m.SALES_ORG=#{salesOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and o.BRANCH_NO = #{branchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY i.MATNR ORDER BY i.DISP_DATE desc

SELECT /*IFNULL(i.PROMOTION_FLAG,'')*/ i.PROMOTION_FLAG FROM t_mst_order_daliy_plan_item i LEFT JOIN t_preorder o on i.ORDER_NO = o.ORDER_NO where 1=1 and i.GIFT_QTY is not NULL and o.PREORDER_STAT !='30' and o.PREORDER_STAT !='40' and i.`STATUS` !='30' and (i.DISP_DATE = #{firstDay,jdbcType=DATE} or i.DISP_DATE = #{secondDay,jdbcType=DATE}) and o.BRANCH_NO = #{branchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and o.SALES_ORG = #{salesOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY i.PROMOTION_FLAG

select i.MATNR,SUM(i.GIFT_QTY) QTY,PROMOTION_FLAG from t_mst_order_daliy_plan_item i LEFT JOIN t_preorder o on i.ORDER_NO = o.ORDER_NO LEFT JOIN t_md_mara_ex e on i.MATNR = e.MATNR and e.SALES_ORG = #{salesOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where 1=1
AND i.GIFT_QTY is not null and i.GIFT_QTY >0 and o.PREORDER_STAT !='20' and o.PREORDER_STAT !='40' and i.`STATUS` !='30' and o.BRANCH_NO = #{branchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ((e.PRE_DAYS= 2 and i.DISP_DATE = #{secondDay,jdbcType=DATE} ) or (e.PRE_DAYS= 1 and i.DISP_DATE = #{firstDay,jdbcType=DATE})) GROUP BY i.PROMOTION_FLAG,i.MATNR ORDER BY i.DISP_DATE desc

select i.MATNR,SUM(i.GIFT_QTY) QTY,PROMOTION_FLAG from t_mst_order_daliy_plan_item i LEFT JOIN t_preorder o on i.ORDER_NO = o.ORDER_NO LEFT JOIN t_md_mara_ex e on i.MATNR = e.MATNR and e.SALES_ORG = #{salesOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where 1=1 and o.PREORDER_SOURCE = '40' AND i.GIFT_QTY is not null and i.GIFT_QTY >0 and o.PREORDER_STAT !='20' and o.PREORDER_STAT !='40' and i.`STATUS` !='30' and o.BRANCH_NO = #{branchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ((e.PRE_DAYS= 2 and i.DISP_DATE = #{secondDay,jdbcType=DATE} ) or (e.PRE_DAYS= 1 and i.DISP_DATE = #{firstDay,jdbcType=DATE})) GROUP BY i.PROMOTION_FLAG,i.MATNR ORDER BY i.DISP_DATE desc

SELECT t1.MATNR,t1.QTY from ( SELECT t.MATNR,SUM(t.QTY) QTY FROM ( SELECT a.MATNR MATNR, sum(a.QTY) QTY FROM ( SELECT i.MATNR,i.QTY,p.PROM_SUB_TYPE FROM t_mst_order_daliy_plan_item i LEFT JOIN t_md_mara m ON i.MATNR = m.MATNR LEFT JOIN t_preorder o ON i.ORDER_NO = o.ORDER_NO LEFT JOIN t_md_mara_ex e ON i.MATNR = e.MATNR AND e.SALES_ORG = #{salesOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} LEFT JOIN t_promotion p ON o.PROMOTION = p.PROM_NO WHERE 1 = 1
AND o.PREORDER_STAT != '30' AND o.PREORDER_STAT != '40' AND i.`STATUS` != '30' AND i.GIFT_QTY IS NULL AND ( ( e.PRE_DAYS = 2 AND i.DISP_DATE = #{secondDay,jdbcType=DATE} ) OR ( e.PRE_DAYS = 1 AND i.DISP_DATE = #{firstDay,jdbcType=DATE} ) ) AND m.SALES_ORG = #{salesOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND o.BRANCH_NO = #{branchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) a WHERE a.PROM_SUB_TYPE IS NULL OR a.PROM_SUB_TYPE != 'Z017' GROUP BY a.MATNR UNION ALL SELECT i.MATNR,SUM(i.INCRE_QTY) QTY FROM t_ssm_req_goods_order_item i LEFT JOIN t_ssm_req_goods_order o on i.ORDER_NO = o.ORDER_NO where 1=1 and o.ORDER_DATE = #{orderDate,jdbcType=DATE} and o.BRANCH_NO = #{branchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY i.MATNR UNION ALL SELECT i.MATNR,SUM(i.QTY) QTY FROM t_ssm_req_goods_order_item i LEFT JOIN t_ssm_req_goods_order o on i.ORDER_NO = o.ORDER_NO where 1=1 and i.FLAG = 2 and o.ORDER_DATE = #{orderDate,jdbcType=DATE} and o.BRANCH_NO = #{branchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY i.MATNR )t where 1=1 and t.MATNR IS NOT NULL GROUP BY t.MATNR )t1 WHERE t1.QTY >0

select i.MATNR,SUM(i.QTY) QTY,SUM(i.BALANCE_AMT) BALANCE_AMT,SUM( i.QTY * i.PRICE) REMAIN_AMT from t_mst_order_daliy_plan_item i LEFT JOIN t_preorder o on i.ORDER_NO = o.ORDER_NO LEFT JOIN t_md_mara_ex e on i.MATNR = e.MATNR and e.SALES_ORG = #{salesOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where 1=1 and o.PREORDER_SOURCE = '40' and o.PREORDER_STAT !='30' and o.PREORDER_STAT !='40' and i.`STATUS` !='30' AND i.GIFT_QTY is null and ((e.PRE_DAYS= 2 and i.DISP_DATE = #{secondDay,jdbcType=DATE} ) or (e.PRE_DAYS= 1 and i.DISP_DATE = #{firstDay,jdbcType=DATE})) and o.BRANCH_NO = #{branchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY i.MATNR

SELECT i.MATNR matnr,SUM(i.QTY) qty,o.ONLINE_SOURCE_TYPE orgCode,sum((i.PRICE-i.PRICE_HOME-i.PRICE_DELIVER)*i.QTY) remainAmt FROM t_mst_order_daliy_plan_item i LEFT JOIN t_preorder o ON i.ORDER_NO = o.ORDER_NO LEFT JOIN t_md_mara_ex e ON i.MATNR = e.MATNR AND e.SALES_ORG = #{salesOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE 1 = 1 AND o.PREORDER_SOURCE = '70' AND o.PREORDER_STAT != '30' AND o.PREORDER_STAT != '40' AND i.`STATUS` != '30' AND ( ( e.PRE_DAYS = 2 AND i.DISP_DATE = #{secondDay,jdbcType=DATE} ) or (e.PRE_DAYS= 1 and i.DISP_DATE = #{firstDay,jdbcType=DATE})) AND o.BRANCH_NO = #{branchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY o.ONLINE_SOURCE_TYPE, i.MATNR

SELECT i.PROMOTION_FLAG FROM t_mst_order_daliy_plan_item i LEFT JOIN t_preorder o on i.ORDER_NO = o.ORDER_NO where 1=1 and i.GIFT_QTY is not NULL and i.DISP_DATE = #{requiredDate,jdbcType=DATE} AND i.STATUS = '20' and o.BRANCH_NO = #{branchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and o.SALES_ORG = #{salesOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY i.PROMOTION_FLAG

SELECT SUM(di.CONFIRM_QTY) qty, di.CONFIRM_MATNR matnr, o.ONLINE_SOURCE_TYPE orgCode,sum((di.PRICE-di.PRICE_HOME-di.PRICE_DELIVER)*di.CONFIRM_QTY) remainAmt FROM t_mst_disp_order_item di LEFT JOIN t_mst_disp_order ti ON di.ORDER_NO = ti.ORDER_NO LEFT JOIN t_preorder o ON di.ORG_ORDER_NO = o.ORDER_NO LEFT JOIN t_md_mara_ex e ON di.MATNR = e.MATNR AND e.SALES_ORG = #{salesOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE 1 = 1 AND ti. STATUS = '20' AND di.CONFIRM_QTY > 0 AND o.BRANCH_NO = #{branchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND o.PREORDER_SOURCE = '70' AND e.SALES_ORG = #{salesOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ti.DISP_DATE = #{orderDate,jdbcType=DATE} GROUP BY o.ONLINE_SOURCE_TYPE, di.CONFIRM_MATNR

SELECT SUM(di.CONFIRM_QTY) QTY,di.CONFIRM_MATNR,SUM( di.CONFIRM_QTY * di.PRICE) REMAIN_AMT from t_mst_disp_order_item di LEFT JOIN t_mst_disp_order ti ON di.ORDER_NO = ti.ORDER_NO LEFT JOIN t_preorder o on di.ORG_ORDER_NO = o.ORDER_NO LEFT JOIN t_md_mara_ex e on di.MATNR = e.MATNR and e.SALES_ORG = #{salesOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where 1=1 AND di.GIFT_FLAG is null AND ti.STATUS = '20' and di.CONFIRM_QTY>0 and o.BRANCH_NO = #{branchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and o.PREORDER_SOURCE = '40' and e.SALES_ORG = #{salesOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ti.DISP_DATE = #{orderDate,jdbcType=DATE} GROUP BY di.CONFIRM_MATNR

SELECT t.MATNR,SUM(t.QTY) QTY, t.CONFIRM_MATNR FROM ( select (select NULL from DUAL) MATNR,SUM(di.CONFIRM_QTY) QTY, di.CONFIRM_MATNR from t_mst_disp_order_item di LEFT JOIN t_preorder o on di.ORG_ORDER_NO = o.ORDER_NO LEFT JOIN t_mst_disp_order disp on di.ORDER_NO = disp.ORDER_NO where 1=1 and disp.`STATUS` = '20' and di.CONFIRM_QTY>0 and di.MATNR=di.CONFIRM_MATNR AND di.GIFT_FLAG is null and disp.DISP_DATE = #{orderDate,jdbcType=DATE} and o.SALES_ORG=#{salesOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and o.BRANCH_NO = #{branchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY di.CONFIRM_MATNR
UNION ALL
select di.MATNR,SUM(di.CONFIRM_QTY) QTY,di.CONFIRM_MATNR from t_mst_disp_order_item di LEFT JOIN t_preorder o on di.ORG_ORDER_NO = o.ORDER_NO LEFT JOIN t_mst_disp_order disp on di.ORDER_NO = disp.ORDER_NO where 1=1 and disp.`STATUS` = '20' and di.MATNR!=di.CONFIRM_MATNR and di.REASON = '10' and di.REPLACE_REASON = '10' and di.CONFIRM_QTY>0 AND di.GIFT_FLAG is null and disp.DISP_DATE =#{orderDate,jdbcType=DATE} and o.SALES_ORG=#{salesOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and o.BRANCH_NO = #{branchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY di.MATNR,di.CONFIRM_MATNR
UNION ALL
SELECT (select NULL from DUAL) MATNR ,SUM(i.INCRE_QTY) QTY,i.MATNR CONFIRM_MATNR FROM t_ssm_req_goods_order_item i LEFT JOIN t_ssm_req_goods_order o on i.ORDER_NO = o.ORDER_NO where 1=1 and i.INCRE_QTY!=null and i.INCRE_QTY!=0 and i.ORDER_DATE = #{orderDate,jdbcType=DATE} and o.BRANCH_NO = #{branchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY i.MATNR
UNION ALL SELECT (select NULL from DUAL) MATNR ,SUM(i.QTY) QTY, i.MATNR CONFIRM_MATNR FROM t_ssm_req_goods_order_item i LEFT JOIN t_ssm_req_goods_order o on i.ORDER_NO = o.ORDER_NO where 1=1 and i.FLAG = 2 and i.QTY>0 and i.ORDER_DATE = #{orderDate,jdbcType=DATE} and o.BRANCH_NO = #{branchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY i.MATNR
UNION ALL SELECT (select NULL from DUAL) MATNR,i.QTY,i.MATNR CONFIRM_MATNR FROM t_mst_inside_sal_order_item i LEFT JOIN t_mst_inside_sal_order o on i.INS_ORDER_NO = o.INS_ORDER_NO LEFT JOIN t_mst_disp_order disp on o.DISP_ORDER_NO = disp.ORDER_NO WHERE 1=1 and i.QTY>0 and o.BRANCH_NO = #{branchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and disp.DISP_DATE = #{orderDate,jdbcType=DATE} GROUP BY i.MATNR )t where 1=1 AND t.QTY>0 and t.CONFIRM_MATNR IS NOT NULL GROUP BY t.CONFIRM_MATNR,t.MATNR

SELECT i.MATNR,i.UNIT,SUM(i.GIFT_QTY) QTY,i.PRICE,a.MATNR_TXT FROM t_mst_order_daliy_plan_item i LEFT JOIN t_md_mara a on i.MATNR = a.MATNR and a.SALES_ORG = #{salesOrg} where i.ORDER_NO = #{orderNo} and i.GIFT_QTY is not null GROUP BY i.MATNR
UNION ALL
SELECT i.MATNR,i.UNIT,SUM(i.QTY) QTY,i.PRICE,a.MATNR_TXT FROM t_mst_order_daliy_plan_item i LEFT JOIN t_md_mara a on i.MATNR = a.MATNR and a.SALES_ORG = #{salesOrg} where 1=1 and i.STATUS !='30' and a.SALES_ORG = #{salesOrg} and i.ORDER_NO = #{orderNo} and i.GIFT_QTY IS NULL GROUP BY i.MATNR
SELECT IFNULL(SUM(cast(AMT as decimal(10,2))),0) FROM t_mst_order_daliy_plan_item WHERE ORDER_NO = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and STATUS ='20'
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM t_mst_order_daliy_plan_item where DISP_DATE >= #{backDate,jdbcType=DATE} and ORDER_NO = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(sum(AMT),0) FROM t_mst_order_daliy_plan_item WHERE DISP_DATE >= #{backDate,jdbcType=DATE} AND ORDER_NO = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND STATUS = '10'
SELECT MIN(DISP_DATE) FROM t_mst_order_daliy_plan_item i WHERE i.ORDER_NO = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and i.`STATUS` != '30'
SELECT MAX(DISP_DATE) FROM t_mst_order_daliy_plan_item i WHERE i.ITEM_NO =#{itemNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and i.`STATUS` != '30'

select i.ORDER_NO, i.ORDER_DATE, i.PLAN_ITEM_NO, i.ITEM_NO, i.DISP_DATE, i.REACH_TIME, i.REACH_TIME_TYPE, i.MATNR, ex.SHORT_TXT MATNR_TXT,i.UNIT, i.QTY, i.PRICE, i.AMT, i.REMAIN_AMT, i.STATUS, i.CREATE_AT, i.CREATE_BY, i.CREATE_BY_TXT, i.LAST_MODIFIED, i.LAST_MODIFIED_BY, i.LAST_MODIFIED_BY_TXT,i.GIFT_QTY,i.PROMOTION_FLAG from t_mst_order_daliy_plan_item i LEFT JOIN t_preorder o on i.ORDER_NO = o.ORDER_NO LEFT JOIN t_md_mara_ex ex on i.MATNR = ex.MATNR where 1 = 1 and o.SALES_ORG = ex.SALES_ORG and i.ORDER_NO =#{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and (GIFT_QTY is NULL OR GIFT_QTY = '') order by i.DISP_DATE asc,i.REMAIN_AMT desc
SELECT COUNT(ORDER_NO) FROM t_mst_order_daliy_plan_item i WHERE i.ORDER_NO = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND i.`STATUS` = '20'
SELECT SUM(i.AMT) FROM t_mst_order_daliy_plan_item i WHERE i.ORDER_NO = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND i.`STATUS` != '30'
SELECT SUM(i.AMT) FROM t_mst_order_daliy_plan_item i WHERE i.ORDER_NO = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND i.`STATUS` = '10'
mapper.update:
update t_mst_order_daliy_plan_item
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where 1=1 and DISP_DATE = #{dispDate,jdbcType=DATE}
and LOCATE(ITEM_NO,${item})>0
mapper.select: SELECT o.ORDER_NO, o.DISCOUNT_AMT PRE_DISCOUNT, o.INIT_AMT, c.VIP_CUST_NO, c.VIP_NAME, c.MP CUST_MP, count(i.QTY)/count(i.DISP_DATE) DALIY_QTY, concat(IFNULL(r.RESIDENTIAL_AREA_TXT,''),IFNULL(a.ADDRESS_TXT,'')) CUST_ADDRESS, ( SELECT IFNULL(SUM(QTY),0) FROM t_mst_order_daliy_plan_item WHERE ORDER_NO = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and DISP_DATE <=#{dispDate,jdbcType=DATE} and i.STATUS!='30' ) REAL_TOTAL, group_concat(DISTINCT e.SHORT_TXT) MATNR_TXT, sum(i.QTY) PRE_TOTAL FROM t_mst_order_daliy_plan_item i LEFT JOIN t_preorder o ON i.ORDER_NO = o.ORDER_NO LEFT JOIN t_vip_cust_info c ON o.MILKMEMBER_NO = c.VIP_CUST_NO LEFT JOIN t_md_address a on o.ADRESS_NO = a.ADDRESS_ID LEFT JOIN t_md_residential_area r on a.RESIDENTIAL_AREA = r.ID LEFT JOIN t_md_mara_ex e ON i.MATNR = e.MATNR AND e.SALES_ORG = o.SALES_ORG WHERE 1=1 and i.ORDER_NO = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and i.STATUS!='30'

select
FROM t_mst_order_daliy_plan_item WHERE ORDER_NO = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and (GIFT_QTY is not null OR GIFT_QTY!='') GROUP BY DISP_DATE HAVING count(DISP_DATE)>1

SELECT o.EMP_NO empNo,i.MATNR matnr,sum(i.QTY) qty FROM t_mst_order_daliy_plan_item i JOIN t_preorder o ON i.ORDER_NO = o.ORDER_NO AND o.BRANCH_NO = #{branchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} LEFT JOIN t_md_mara_ex e ON i.MATNR = e.MATNR AND e.SALES_ORG = #{salesOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} LEFT JOIN t_promotion p ON o.PROMOTION = p.PROM_NO WHERE 1 = 1
AND o.PREORDER_STAT != '30' AND o.PREORDER_STAT != '40' AND i.`STATUS` != '30' AND i.GIFT_QTY IS NULL AND ( ( e.PRE_DAYS = 2 AND i.DISP_DATE = #{secondDay,jdbcType=DATE} ) OR ( e.PRE_DAYS = 1 AND i.DISP_DATE = #{firstDay,jdbcType=DATE} ) ) AND ( p.PROM_SUB_TYPE IS NULL OR p.PROM_SUB_TYPE != 'Z017' ) GROUP BY o.EMP_NO, i.MATNR
SELECT IFNULL(SUM(cast(AMT as decimal(10,2))),0) FROM t_mst_order_daliy_plan_item WHERE ITEM_NO = #{planItemNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and (STATUS ='20' or STATUS = '10')

SELECT o.ONLINE_SOURCE_TYPE onlinecode, SUM(di.CONFIRM_QTY) qty, di.CONFIRM_MATNR matnr, di.PRICE price FROM t_mst_disp_order_item di LEFT JOIN t_mst_disp_order ti ON di.ORDER_NO = ti.ORDER_NO LEFT JOIN t_preorder o ON di.ORG_ORDER_NO = o.ORDER_NO WHERE 1 = 1 AND di.GIFT_FLAG IS NULL AND ti.STATUS = '20' AND di.CONFIRM_QTY > 0 AND o.BRANCH_NO = #{branchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND o.PREORDER_SOURCE = '10' AND o.ONLINE_SOURCE_TYPE != null AND ti.DISP_DATE = #{orderDate,jdbcType=DATE} GROUP BY o.ONLINE_SOURCE_TYPE, di.CONFIRM_MATNR, di.PRICE

SELECT SUM(di.CONFIRM_QTY) qty, di.CONFIRM_MATNR matnr, p.PROMOTION promotion , o.ONLINE_SOURCE_TYPE onlinecode FROM t_mst_disp_order_item di LEFT JOIN t_mst_disp_order ti ON di.ORDER_NO = ti.ORDER_NO LEFT JOIN t_preorder o ON di.ORG_ORDER_NO = o.ORDER_NO LEFT JOIN t_mst_plan_order_item p ON di.ORG_ITEM_NO = p.ITEM_NO WHERE 1 = 1 AND di.GIFT_FLAG IS NOT NULL AND ti. STATUS = '20' AND di.CONFIRM_QTY > 0 AND o.BRANCH_NO = #{branchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND o.PREORDER_SOURCE = '10' AND o.ONLINE_SOURCE_TYPE != null AND ti.DISP_DATE = #{orderDate,jdbcType=DATE} GROUP BY o.ONLINE_SOURCE_TYPE, di.CONFIRM_MATNR, p.PROMOTION

select i.MATNR matnr, SUM(i.QTY) qty, SUM(i.BALANCE_AMT) amt, o.ONLINE_SOURCE_TYPE onlinecode, i.PRICE price from t_mst_order_daliy_plan_item i LEFT JOIN t_preorder o on i.ORDER_NO = o.ORDER_NO LEFT JOIN t_md_mara_ex e on i.MATNR = e.MATNR and e.SALES_ORG = #{salesOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where 1=1 AND o.PREORDER_SOURCE = '10' AND o.ONLINE_SOURCE_TYPE != null AND o.PREORDER_STAT !='30' AND o.PREORDER_STAT !='40' AND i.`STATUS` !='30' AND o.ONLINE_SOURCE_TYPE != null AND i.GIFT_QTY is null AND ((e.PRE_DAYS= 2 AND i.DISP_DATE = #{secondDay,jdbcType=DATE} ) or (e.PRE_DAYS= 1 AND i.DISP_DATE = #{firstDay,jdbcType=DATE})) AND o.BRANCH_NO = #{branchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY o.ONLINEORDER_NO, i.MATNR, i.PRICE

SELECT SUM(di.CONFIRM_QTY) QTY,di.CONFIRM_MATNR from t_mst_disp_order_item di LEFT JOIN t_mst_disp_order ti ON di.ORDER_NO = ti.ORDER_NO LEFT JOIN t_preorder o on di.ORG_ORDER_NO = o.ORDER_NO LEFT JOIN t_md_mara_ex e on di.MATNR = e.MATNR and e.SALES_ORG = #{salesOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where 1=1 AND di.GIFT_FLAG is null AND ti.STATUS = '20' and di.CONFIRM_QTY>0 and o.BRANCH_NO = #{branchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and o.PREORDER_SOURCE = '90' and e.SALES_ORG = #{salesOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ti.DISP_DATE = #{orderDate,jdbcType=DATE} GROUP BY di.CONFIRM_MATNR

select i.MATNR,SUM(i.QTY) QTY from t_mst_order_daliy_plan_item i LEFT JOIN t_preorder o on i.ORDER_NO = o.ORDER_NO LEFT JOIN t_md_mara_ex e on i.MATNR = e.MATNR and e.SALES_ORG = #{salesOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where 1=1 and o.PREORDER_SOURCE = '90' and o.PREORDER_STAT !='30' and o.PREORDER_STAT !='40' and i.`STATUS` !='30' AND i.GIFT_QTY is null and ((e.PRE_DAYS= 2 and i.DISP_DATE = #{secondDay,jdbcType=DATE} ) or (e.PRE_DAYS= 1 and i.DISP_DATE = #{firstDay,jdbcType=DATE})) and o.BRANCH_NO = #{branchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY i.MATNR
